ModMetaData.name: XxHyde840xX's Choice Chops - Volume Three - FINAL CUT
ModMetaData.author: XxHyde840xX/Various
ModMetaData.description:
The final selection of choice items, carefully chopped from their respective mods. An exhaustive list is as follows;
[GrimWorld 40,000 - Vehicles of Grimworld] - ONLY REQUIRES "VEHICLE FRAMEWORK" AND "VANILLA VEHICLES EXPANDED" MODS! - That's right folks, we've got MOAR TANKS BAYBEE! And I'm doing the heavy lifting to yeet a whole-ass framework out of the mix. - What I've done here is switched Research Prerequisites to Advanced Fabrication, and replaced references and build-costs where needed. - Nothing else really of note changed aside from the fact that you don't need the Core Imperialis mod to use these anymore. It was silly. - I plan to keep this all updated with any changes, fixes, and additions that happen to Grimworld 40,000 Vehicles in the future. - Super incompatible with the original mod, which can be found here; https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3026724919.
FUN FACT! Did you know...?
[Apocrypha 2033 - Just The Sweats] - - - - -
FUN FACT! Did you know...?
[WarCasket Barbatos Gundam Addon (Continued)] - - - - -
FUN FACT! Did you know...?
[Amrita - Remastered] - - - - -
FUN FACT! Did you know...?
[Stabilized Mechanites - Remastered] - - - - -
FUN FACT! Did you know...?
[BDs Combat Enhancers - Remastered] - - - - -
FUN FACT! Did you know...?
[RimField 5042 - Just The Tanks] - - - - -
FUN FACT! Did you know...?
[Kitsune Armor] =============================================================================================================================
This marks the end of this particular modpack, and the conclusion to the Choice Chops series. All good things must come to an end.
XxHyde840xX - o7
